channel.title: [PI] How to connect to my server?
channel.description: Yeah I know this is pretty basic but I haven't coded in a while. Where do I put my no-ip in the client and the server? I'm portforwarded and all that jazz I just need to know where to stick my no-ip. Thanks guys!
